overview: Gay-porn legend Michael Brandon returns to Club Inferno to remind our hungry holes who's a Bad Ass. Starring the biggest, sloppiest holes in the business, Bad Ass features non-stop gut-punching action from a bunch of bad-ass tops who know how to keep a good hole down. So pull out your leather, mirrored-glasses, and the biggest dildos you've got and ride along with all the up-to-the-elbow action! These holes know no limits but they do know who's the boss.
title: Bad Ass
